title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.12 - Leaves required by law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.12 - Leaves required by law

State Regulations

The appointing authority shall grant any leave of absence, with pay, required by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
21.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
